name: Code Snippet
description: Stylized code container with action slot and theme overrides.

use: you want a styled code block with optional actions.
you need consistent padding and borders for code display.
avoid: plain `Text` with monospaced style is sufficient.

patterns.title: Action buttons

theming: `CodeSnippetTheme` controls background, border, radius, and padding.
accessibility: Use readable font sizes for code text.
do: Keep code lines short for readability.
dont: Place large, scroll-heavy code blocks without constraints.
